name: Harpoon
description: What is the project about? Harpoon is a real-time tracker of whale purchases and DeFi trends, designed to provide users with valuable insights into potential investment opportunities. What makes your project unique? It is unique as it provides comprehensive coverage of all major DeFi projects and tracks whale purchases, allowing users to stay ahead of the market and make informed decisions based on the latest market movements. History of your project. Harpoon was created in 2023 in response to the increasing popularity of DeFi projects. The team behind Harpoon saw an opportunity to provide users with a comprehensive overview of the market and insights into potential investments. What’s next for your project? What’s next for Harpoon is to continue to improve the platform and provide users with more sophisticated features and insights. What can your token be used for? The Harpoon token can be used to access premium features and services on the platform, such as advanced analytics and personalized alerts. It can also be used to reward users who contribute valuable data and insights to the platform.
